io.github.reggert.reb4j

Class Adopted

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.reggert.reb4j.AbstractExpression
      • io.github.reggert.reb4j.Adopted
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Expression, Serializable

    public final class Adopted
extends AbstractExpression
    Expression constructed by "adopting" the expression string from an instance of Pattern. Note that adopted expressions must be constructed from instances of Pattern and not raw Strings, because the Pattern class ensures that the expressions parse properly.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
